quote: Focus on the journey, not the destination.
author: Greg Anderson

quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Concentration is the secret of strength.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Focus is the key to unlocking your potential.
author: Anonymous

quote: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: William Faulkner

quote: Focus on the possibilities for success, not on the potential for failure.
author: Anonymous

quote: Where focus goes, energy flows.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work in hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: The main thing is to keep the main thing the main thing.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: Your focus determines your reality.
author: George Lucas

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle

quote: You will never reach your destination if you stop and throw stones at every dog that barks.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Focus is a matter of deciding what things you're not going to do.
author: John Carmack

quote: What you stay focused on will grow.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Focus on the solution, not the problem.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Don't confuse movement with progress. A rocking horse keeps moving but doesn't make any progress.
author: Alfred A. Montapert

author: Greg Anderson

author: Bruce Lee

author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Focus on the solution, not the problem.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Don't confuse movement with progress. A rocking horse keeps moving but doesn't make any progress.
author: Alfred A. Montapert

quote: Energy flows where attention goes.
author: Michael Beckwith

quote: It is not enough to be busy… The question is: What are we busy about?
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The ability to focus attention on important things is a defining characteristic of intelligence.
author: Robert J. Shiller

quote: An eagle never loses sleep over the opinion of pigeons.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem. We all have twenty-four hour days.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Always remember, your focus determines your reality.
author: Qui-Gon Jinn (Star Wars)

quote: Simplicity is about subtracting the obvious and adding the meaningful.
author: John Maeda

quote: Don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out your own inner voice.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire, not things we fear.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Focus means eliminating distractions, not just ignoring them.
author: Anonymous

quote: He who chases two rabbits catches neither.
author: Russian Proverb

quote: A clear vision, backed by definite plans, gives you a tremendous feeling of confidence and personal power.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: When you have clarity of intention, the universe conspires with you to make it happen.
author: Fabienne Fredrickson

quote: Your results are the product of either personal focus or personal distractions. The choice is yours.
author: John Di Lemme

quote: The successful person has the habit of doing the things failures don’t like to do.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: The art of being wise is the art of knowing what to overlook.
author: William James

quote: Do more of what matters and let the rest go.
author: Anonymous

quote: The first requisite for success is the ability to apply your physical and mental energies to one problem incessantly without growing weary.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work.
author: H.L. Hunt

quote: A goal properly set is halfway reached.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Successful people maintain a positive focus in life no matter what is going on around them.
author: Jack Canfield

quote: You don’t need more time in your day. You need to decide.
author: Seth Godin
